title: Enhancing Disaster Response Capabilities and Building Community Resilience Through Non-Formal Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Structuring an educational environment that enhances disaster response capabilities and promotes social interaction through daily-life-linked activities for in-service practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three personal/community-level response strategies in disaster situations.

After performing discussions and role-playing activities on three crisis scenarios (financial crisis, team conflict, customer complaints) in a one-week intensive course, learners demonstrate crisis judgment by scoring 4+ points (out of 5) in four of five evaluation rubric items (problem recognition, alternative proposals, action plans)
Learners can design and implement collaborative approaches to strengthen community resilience.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
